source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
This is the text to translate: "The about 1,400 police officers who were deployed arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of carnival and are now also investigating several cases of assault and sexual offences. Exact figures on crime at the start of the session will be available next week."
Translation:
According to the news report, the 1,400 police officers deployed during the start of the carnival season have detained six suspected pickpockets and are now investigating several cases of assault and sexual crimes. Exact crime figures for the start of the carnival season will be available next week.Translate

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
